metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18444 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
makeMultiView.cpp in exrmultiview in OpenEXR 2.3.0 has an out-of-bounds write, leading to an assertion failure or possibly unspecified other impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18444` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr22 - 2.2.0-10ubuntu2.1
openexr - 2.2.0-10ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> proposed patch in bug  The patch for this issue was dropped during the focal development cycle by mistake.

criterions.comment: openexr package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-10ubuntu2.1').
